summary: The customer asked about Contoso Wireless's internet product, including the speeds and prices available, whether there are any contracts or installation fees, how long it takes to install the service, and if any special equipment or hardware is needed. The customer service agent provided information that there are speeds from 5 Mbps up to 100 Mbps, no contracts are required, installation fees vary based on the plan and location, it takes 7-10 business days to install the service, customer service and technical support are included in the price of the plan, and a modem and router can be provided for an additional fee of $99.
